ActualSales emerged as a unique online marketing agency with a disruptive business model positioning itself as an online sale agency focused in getting results with no risk for its clients. We are a Portuguese multinational company that develops performance-based webmarketing campaigns in more than 15 countries worldwide. We have a mission to revolutionize marketing spending by implementing web-based campaigns assuming investing risk for our clients. We are a pragmatic results oriented team with a mix of creative, quantitative and consumer focus skills.

Finding and engaging new customers online enables sales teams to get additional sales, extra revenues, higher earning margins and more sustainable marketing. Standard commitments with clients such as high sales conversion, no risk, no setup cost, scalability with success and exclusive for sales proved ActualSales business model to be unique and highly competitive making of it the biggest Portuguese online investor. With a high level of commitment, operational autonomy and top-management enrollment, ActualSales is successfully established in Portugal, Spain, Brazil and MÃ©xico and earn the confidence to promote online sales operations for corporations such as Barclays Bank, Microsoft, AmÃ©rica MÃ³vil, Oi, Telefonica, BNP-Paribas, Tranquilidade, SONAE Sierra and many others.
